    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2841</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Women of Influence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frauen des Einflusses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Femmes d'influence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mulheres da influência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Donne di influenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γυναίκες της επιρροής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mujeres de la influencia</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A collection of facts and articles about important women who have made some change in the world.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">women</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">biography</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Tatsachen und Artikel über 
wichtige Frauen, die etwas Änderung in der Welt vorgenommen haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection de faits et d'articles concernant 
les femmes importantes qui ont fait un certain changement du monde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção dos fatos e dos artigos sobre as 
mulheres importantes que fizeram alguma mudança no mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di fatti e di articoli sulle donne
importanti che hanno fatto un certo cambiamento nel mondo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των γεγονότων και των άρθρων για τις 
σημαντικές γυναίκες που έχουν κάνει κάποια αλλαγή στον κόσμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de hechos y de artículos acerca 
de las mujeres importantes que han realizado un cierto cambio en el 
mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
